original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2336)@</color>將指定地區化為鬼域，以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(2336)@</color><color=#13ccd7>智力</color>對敵人造成法術傷害，同時對受到傷害的對象附加緩速效果。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2336)@</color> to transform the designated area into a ghost domain with <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(2336 )@</color><color=#13ccd7>Int</color> inflicts spell damage on the enemy, and at the same time adds a slowing effect to the injured object.
